items.title: Citi Stays Bullish on Microsoft (MSFT), Cites AI Agent Momentum
items.description: We recently published a list of 12 AI Stocks on Analysts’ Radar. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) stands against other AI stocks on analysts’ radar. The recently imposed US sanctions on chip use have angered China. In recent news, the country has stated that it […]

items.title: Tracking Jeremy Grantham's GMO Capital Portfolio - Q1 2025 Update
Microsoft to host Musk's Grok 3 despite ongoing OpenAI legal battle
items.description: Microsoft and Elon Musk team up to bring Grok 3 to Microsoft users amid legal battle between Musk and Open AI/Microsoft.

items.title: Google is banking on AI agents, smart glasses to defend its search crown
items.description: Google is looking for its next major hit to ensure it holds on to its leadership in search.

items.title: Microsoft, Law Enforcement Agencies Disrupt 'Go-To' Malware
items.description: Microsoft said Wednesday that its digital crimes unit, along with law enforcement agencies, disrupted a prominent malware that had infected thousands of computers.
